text: Because of the Cats is a 1973 Dutch Belgian crime drama movie directed by Fons Rademakers and was based on the novel of the same name by Nicolas Freeling. It stars Bryan Marshall, Alexandra Stewart, Sebastian Graham Jones, Edward Judd, Sylvia Kristel, Delia Lindsay, Roger Hammond, George Baker. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 crime drama movies Category:Dutch crime movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Belgian crime movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fons Rademakers
title: Because of the Cats
